name: boho bloom coasters
notes:
add some charm to your coffee table (or night stand) with these easy-to-make crochet coasters. the boho bloom coasters are made in the round using cotton yarn. make 4 or 6 for the perfect coffee table set!

details:
- pattern is written in standard us terms.
- basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern.
- pattern includes step-by-step photos and a guided video tutorial.
- level: a beginner-friendly pattern.
- size of coaster, 4 1/2 inches.

please note: you can always reach out to ask for help with this pattern.

materials needed:
-1 skein of wecrochet dishie yarn in the color swan (weight 4/100 grams, 190 yards). you will only need 20 yards of yarn for one coaster. you can make a total of 9 coasters using 1 skein of dishie yarn.
-5.5 mm (i) crochet hook.
-darning needle.
-scissors.
